project.name: J-C834A-CMUD-09-ST03-DT01-DF12-CF01-01
project.description: This test takes a number and attempts to determine whether it is prime by dividing it by each number less than it. For large enough prime integers, this calculation takes an excessive amount of time.

iopair.name: J-C834A-CMUD-09-ST03-DT01-DF12-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="68718952445" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_GkzpEpJxnD6O4uVhDThb AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_u7aiGEI3Dk OR (NOT finished_jqWTO4oxlM AND NOT (controlled_exit_gvbKH829XE OR continued_execution_bfnAjouVEa)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_u7aiGEI3Dk OR (NOT finished_jqWTO4oxlM AND NOT (controlled_exit_gvbKH829XE OR continued_execution_bfnAjouVEa))) OR controlled_exit_gvbKH829XE)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_u7aiGEI3Dk OR (NOT finished_jqWTO4oxlM AND NOT (controlled_exit_gvbKH829XE OR continued_execution_bfnAjouVEa)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_u7aiGEI3Dk OR (NOT finished_jqWTO4oxlM AND NOT (controlled_exit_gvbKH829XE OR continued_execution_bfnAjouVEa))) OR controlled_exit_gvbKH829XE))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
